# CheckVibe

> AI-powered website security scanner with 30+ automated checks.

CheckVibe scans websites for security vulnerabilities in under 60 seconds. It runs 30 security scanners in parallel to detect issues before attackers do.

## What It Does

CheckVibe is a SaaS security scanning platform for web developers, indie hackers, and teams who ship fast. Enter a URL, click scan, and get a comprehensive security audit covering:

- SQL injection detection
- Cross-site scripting (XSS) detection
- Exposed API key scanning (50+ providers)
- Security header analysis (CSP, HSTS, X-Frame-Options)
- SSL/TLS certificate and cipher auditing
- CORS misconfiguration detection
- CSRF vulnerability testing
- Cookie security analysis
- DNS configuration checks (DNSSEC, SPF, DKIM, DMARC)
- Open redirect detection
- File upload vulnerability scanning
- DDoS protection analysis (WAF, CDN, rate limiting)
- Domain hijacking risk assessment
- Dependency vulnerability scanning (npm CVEs)
- GitHub secret leak detection
- Backend-specific security checks (Supabase RLS, Firebase rules, Convex)
- Hosting provider audits (Vercel, Netlify, Cloudflare, Railway)
- AI/vibe coding detection and security pattern analysis
- Audit logging and monitoring assessment
- Mobile API security checks

## Pricing

- Free: 1 project, 3 scans/month, issue overview (blurred details)
- Starter ($19/month): 1 project, 5 scans/month, full scan suite, scan history
- Pro ($39/month): 3 projects, 20 scans/month, all features
- Max ($79/month): 10 projects, 50 scans/month, all features, priority support

Annual billing saves 30%.

## Who It's For

- Solo developers and indie hackers shipping side projects
- Small teams building SaaS products
- Agencies auditing client websites
- Anyone who vibe codes with AI and wants to verify security
- Developers who need continuous security monitoring without hiring a pentester
